00006         int option_details::handle_event_onclick(object *obj)
00007         {
00008                if( b_continue==obj)     {
00009                         return UNLOAD_CWIN;
00010                 }
00011                 else if( b_del==obj)    {
00012                 del =true;
00013                 return UNLOAD_CWIN;
00014                 }
00015                 else if( b_cancel==obj) {
00016                 return CANCEL_CWIN;
00017                 }
00018          return OK;
00019                 }
